shots.description: This is a beautiful shot.  The first quarter of it, tracking the actress through the hanging clothes is very dreamy.  Headroom is excellent.  Watch as we enter the house for the first time, Baker's anticipation of the headroom needed for the actress about to enter frame.

This shot takes us, almost as an invisible observer around a large party.  The movement is smooth and consistent.  Notice how the camera is always on something.  Any dead space, that would normally be in pans or other changes in direction, is intentionally filled by a subject.
